casebody.data:
ALLSTATE INSURANCE
v.
LAHOUD, et al. No. 14A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 11, 2005. P.C. Barwick, Jr., Kinston, for Allstate Insurance Co. Sonya DuBree, Garner, for Guardian Ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time of ten (10) days to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed for Defendant to have up to and including the 14th day of March 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of March 2005."
